snippet: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has reached a settlement with a Montreal man it accused of fraud, barring the man from any future offerings of so-called penny stocks....

headline.print_headline: SEC Settles With Canadian Man Tied to Penny Stock Scam
headline.main: SEC Settles With Canadian Man Tied to Penny Stock Scam

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has reached a settlement with a Montreal man it accused of fraud, barring the man from any future offerings of so-called penny stocks.
